DOC.brief_summary: In situ study to compare treatment effect on enamel remineralization potential, measured by surface microhardness recovery (SMHR) and Enamel Fluoride Uptake (EFU). The study will explore the efficacy of an experimental sodium monofluorophosphate (SMFP) dentifrice containing calcium sodium phosphosilicate (CSP) in comparison to an experimental SMFP only dentifrice.
DOC.brief_title: Anti-caries Potential of a Sodium Monofluorophosphate and Calcium Sodium Phosphosilicate Dentifrice
DOC.criteria: Wears a removable bilateral mandibular partial denture that has good stability and support, with sufficient room on each side in the posterior buccal flange area to accommodate two enamel specimens [required dimensions 12 x 7 millimeters (mm)].
